references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational theory of multi-armed bandit problems, which is the theoretical basis for the upper confidence bound (UCB) algorithm used in Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS).
This is a highly influential paper in the field of hyperparameter optimization that demonstrates the effectiveness of random search, providing a benchmark for more sophisticated methods.

references.paper_title: A survey of Monte Carlo tree search methods
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS), the core algorithm used for search space transfer in the proposed MCTS-transfer method.

references.paper_title: Efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions
references.reason: This paper introduces the Efficient Global Optimization (EGO) algorithm, a foundational method in Bayesian Optimization (BO), which is used as a base algorithm in the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Taking the human out of the loop: A review of Bayesian optimization
references.reason: This is a highly cited survey paper on Bayesian Optimization (BO), providing background and context for the transfer learning approach proposed in this research.
